did.head: Overview

origination.label: Creator:
origination.corpname: Stanford University. Faculty Committee on Women's Athletics

did.unittitle: Stanford University, Faculty Committee on Women's Athletics, minutes
did.abstract: Collection includes minutes from 1919-21 and one meeting in 1929. Issues before the committee included intercollegiate versus intramural competitions, training rules, response to invitations for competitive games, and rejection of varsity teams. Committee members included Helen Masters Bunting, Clara S. Stoltenberg, Isabel McCracken, and Harriet Bradford.

repository.label: Repository:
repository.corpname: Department of Special Collections and University Archives

accessrestrict.head: Information about Access
accessrestrict.p: This collection is open for research.

userestrict.head: Ownership & Copyright
userestrict.p: All requests to reproduce, publish, quote from, or otherwise use collection materials must be submitted in writing to the Head of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, California 94304-6064. Consent is given on behalf of Special Collections as the owner of the physical items and is not intended to include or imply permission from the copyright owner. Such permission must be obtained from the copyright owner, heir(s) or assigns. See: http://library.stanford.edu/depts/spc/pubserv/permissions.html.
Restrictions also apply to digital representations of the original materials. Use of digital files is restricted to research and educational purposes.

prefercite.head: Cite As
prefercite.p: Stanford University, Faculty Committee on Women's Athletics, Minutes (SCM0277). Dept. of Special Collections and University Archives, Stanford University Libraries, Stanford, Calif.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Sketch
bioghist.p: This committee, appointed by the University President in 1919, was directed to settle matters of policy, eligibility, and scheduling.

scopecontent.head: Description of the Collection
scopecontent.p: Collection includes minutes from 1919-21 and one meeting in 1929. Issues before the committee included intercollegiate versus intramural competitions, training rules, response to invitations for competitive games, and rejection of varsity teams. Committee members included Helen Masters Bunting, Clara S. Stoltenberg, Isabel McCracken, and Harriet Bradford.
